00017 #include "MisrFileQuery.h"
00018 #include "MisrUtil.h"
00019 #include "MisrError.h"
00020 #include <hdf.h>
00021 
00040 MTKt_status MtkFileBlockMetaFieldRead(
00041   const char *filename, 
00042   const char *blockmetaname, 
00043   const char *fieldname, 
00044   MTKt_DataBuffer *blockmetabuf  )
00045 {
00046   MTKt_status status_code; /* Return status of this function */
00047   MTKt_status status;      /* Return status */
00048   intn hdfstatus;
00049   int32 file_id = FAIL;
00050 
00051   if (filename == NULL)
00052     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR);
00053 
00054   /* Open HDF File */
00055   file_id = HDFopen(filename, DFACC_READ, 0);
00056   if (file_id == FAIL)
00057     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDF_HDFOPEN_FAILED);
00058 
00059   /* Read block metadata field. */
00060   status = MtkFileBlockMetaFieldReadFid(file_id, blockmetaname, fieldname, 
00061                     blockmetabuf);
00062   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00063 
00064   /* Close HDF file */  
00065   hdfstatus = HDFclose(file_id);
00066   if (hdfstatus == FAIL)
00067     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDF_HDFCLOSE_FAILED);
00068   file_id = FAIL;
00069 
00070   return MTK_SUCCESS;
00071 
00072 ERROR_HANDLE:
00073   if (file_id != FAIL)
00074     HDFclose(file_id);
00075   
00076   return status_code;
00077 }
00078 
00084 MTKt_status MtkFileBlockMetaFieldReadFid(
00085   int32 file_id,               
00086   const char *blockmetaname, 
00087   const char *fieldname, 
00088   MTKt_DataBuffer *blockmetabuf  )
00089 {
00090   MTKt_status status_code; /* Return status of this function */
00091   MTKt_status status;      /* Return status */
00092   intn hdfstatus;
00093   int32 hdf_datatype;
00094   int32 vdata_ref = FAIL;
00095   int32 vdata_id = FAIL;
00096   int32 count;
00097   int32 field_index;
00098   int32 n_records;
00099   MTKt_DataBuffer blockmetabuf_tmp = MTKT_DATABUFFER_INIT;
00100                                 /* Temp attribute buffer */
00101   MTKt_DataType datatype;       /* Mtk data type */ 
00102   int vstart_active = 0;
00103 
00104   if (blockmetaname == NULL || fieldname == NULL ||
00105       blockmetabuf == NULL)
00106     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR);
00107 
00108   /* Initialize the vdata interface */
00109   hdfstatus = Vstart(file_id);
00110   if (hdfstatus == FAIL)
00111     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDF_VSTART_FAILED);
00112   vstart_active = 1;
00113   
00114   /* Find reference number of block metadata structure */
00115   vdata_ref = VSfind(file_id, blockmetaname);
00116   if (vdata_ref == 0) /* Failure */
00117     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDF_VSFIND_FAILED);
00118   
00119   vdata_id = VSattach(file_id, vdata_ref, "r");
00120   if (vdata_id == FAIL)
00121     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDF_VSATTACH_FAILED);
00122   
00123   /* Find field index */
00124   hdfstatus = VSfindex(vdata_id, fieldname, &field_index);
00125   if (hdfstatus == FAIL)
00126     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDF_VSFINDEX_FAILED);
00127   
00128   /* Determine data type of field */
00129   hdf_datatype = VFfieldtype(vdata_id, field_index);
00130   if (hdf_datatype == FAIL)
00131     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDF_VFFIELDTYPE_FAILED);
00132   
00133   /* Convert from HDF data type to MTK data type */
00134   status = MtkHdfToMtkDataTypeConvert(hdf_datatype, &datatype);
00135   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00136   
00137   /* Number of records in a field */
00138   n_records = VSelts(vdata_id);
00139   if (n_records == FAIL)
00140     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDF_VSELTS_FAILED);
00141     
00142   /* Allocate Memory */
00143   if (datatype == MTKe_char8) /* Data is a string */
00144   {
00145     count = VSsizeof(vdata_id, (char*)fieldname);
00146     if (count == FAIL)
00147       MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDF_VSSIZEOF_FAILED);
00148     
00149     status = MtkDataBufferAllocate(n_records, count, datatype, &blockmetabuf_tmp);
00150     MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00151   }
00152   else
00153   {
00154     count = VFfieldorder(vdata_id, field_index);
00155     if (count == FAIL)
00156       MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDF_VFFIELDORDER_FAILED);
00157       
00158     status = MtkDataBufferAllocate(n_records, count, datatype, &blockmetabuf_tmp);
00159     MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00160   }
00161   
00162   /* Select field to read */
00163   hdfstatus = VSsetfields(vdata_id, fieldname);
00164   if (hdfstatus == FAIL)
00165     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDF_VSSETFIELDS_FAILED);
00166 
00167   /* Read field, since only one field is being read there is no need to unpack */
00168   hdfstatus = VSread(vdata_id, blockmetabuf_tmp.dataptr, n_records, FULL_INTERLACE);
00169   if (hdfstatus == FAIL)
00170     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDF_VSREAD_FAILED);
00171 
00172   hdfstatus = VSdetach(vdata_id);
00173   if (hdfstatus == FAIL)
00174     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDF_VSDETACH_FAILED);
00175   
00176   /* End access to the vdata interface */     
00177   hdfstatus = Vend(file_id);
00178   if (hdfstatus == FAIL)
00179     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDF_VEND_FAILED);
00180   vstart_active = 0;
00181   
00182   *blockmetabuf = blockmetabuf_tmp;
00183 
00184   return MTK_SUCCESS;
00185 
00186 ERROR_HANDLE:
00187   if (vdata_id != FAIL)
00188     VSdetach(vdata_id);
00189   
00190   if (vstart_active)
00191     Vend(file_id);
00192   
00193   MtkDataBufferFree(&blockmetabuf_tmp);
00194 
00195   return status_code;
00196 }
